allFeatures.name: Divine Sense
allFeatures.description: The presence of strong evil registers on your senses like a noxious odor, and powerful good rings like heavenly music in your ears.

allFeatures.name: Lay on Hands
allFeatures.description: Your blessed touch can heal wounds.

allFeatures.name: Fighting Style
allFeatures.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

allFeatures.name: Spellcasting
allFeatures.description: By 2nd level, you have learned to draw on divine magic through meditation and prayer.

allFeatures.name: Divine Smite
allFeatures.description: Starting at 2nd level, when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target.

allFeatures.name: Divine Health
allFeatures.description: By 3rd level, the divine magic flowing through you makes you immune to disease.

allFeatures.name: Sacred Oath
allFeatures.description: At 3rd level, you swear the oath that binds you as a paladin forever.
